trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange" /> .

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> evento ocorre quando um painel de marcas inteligentes é exibido ou oculto.

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é gerado diretamente pelo painel, mas em vez disso, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> quando seu <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> métodos são executados.

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se o painel está sendo exibido ou oculto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento, o `relatedObject` parâmetro sempre referencia o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> que o painel está associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um sinalizador que indica se o painel de marcações inteligentes está sendo exibido ou oculto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType" /> that indicates the state of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType" /> que indica o estado do painel.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide>.
trans-unit.target: Se o painel está sendo ocultado por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> método, essa propriedade tem um valor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide>.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show>.
trans-unit.target: Se o painel está sendo exibido por meio de uma chamada para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, essa propriedade tem um valor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto associado ao painel de marcações inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associada com o painel de marca inteligente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> propriedade permite que o programador associar um objeto para uma instância do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto, em seguida, está disponível para os métodos que manipulam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> evento.
